title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Scuba Steve: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Scuba Steve: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Scuba Steve discuss movie characters they dislike, their favorite women in music right now, why Morgan is having bad luck, their past hospital stories, and some life updates from Scuba Steve.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
